resources.string:
About: 
 Find those planets! Tapping the button to reveal the planet or to trigger a scan. Try to find all planets hidden behind the button using least scans. The number on the button shows how many planets in its row and column. You can select different size of game boards and planets in option screen.

 Author : 
 YIRAN GUO , A computing science student in Simon Fraser University 

 Others:
 This is assignment 3 of CMPT276 in Simon Fraser University, Course Link :			 CMPT276

 Resources:
 Thanks for authors of following resources 
 Planet Icons : Button Icon
 Welcome screen background : Background
 Button sound effect:Sound Effect
